analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders a scalable SVG cross (X) icon with configurable fill color via a prop.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, customizable cross icon for navigation or UI controls within the project.

Components.name: IconCross
Components.role: Root component that encapsulates the SVG markup and exposes a `fill` prop for color customization.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines and validates component props in Vue's `<script setup>` context.

fill.description: Determines the fill color of the SVG path.

Dependencies.purpose: Core Vue composition API used to declare component props.

analysis.Usage: Import the component and place it in templates. Example: `import IconCross from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconCross.vue'` then `<IconCross fill="#ff0000" />`.
Notes: No `<style>` section—styling is controlled via the `fill` prop and CSS variables.
SVG viewBox and dimensions are fixed at 26×26; scaling can be handled by parent containers or CSS.
Uses `fill-rule` and `clip-rule` to ensure correct rendering of the overlapping path segments.
